website_summaries.verdict: Sony's slimmed-down, network-ready PS2 is a welcome update to the world's most popular video game console.
pros: built-in networking/modem ports and remote sensor
free online gaming with select titles

customer_reviews.title: Came with Roaches (didn't know I paid for Roaches)
customer_reviews.text: Bought it.. Console makes a loud clicking sound when beginning to read disk which is fine.. Console is bronzing from age.. Also fine.. Console came with a Colony of German Cockroaches..... NOT ACCEPTABLE
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Treadway

customer_reviews.title: i just got the console and when i opened it ...
customer_reviews.text: i just got the console and when i opened it it had bugs in inside it !!!!! i was beyond shocked! this was suppose to be a gift for my boys!!
customer_reviews.author: A. H

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints Originally
customer_reviews.text: Console was delivered on time, 2 day Prime shipping. I have only played about an hour of Mortal Kombat Trilogy which means the system is playing a PS ONE game just fine. I've had no issues and just waiting on my ps2 games to be delivered, bought this system because I've been having a nostalgia crave, 5 Star so far Update Having to downgrade from 5 to 3 stars because I do not believe now it is the games themselves that are the issue as ps2 is not reading some games and other games won't load at certain points of that game, likely needs cleaned on the inside, possibly dust a/o laser/lens clean.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence

customer_reviews.title: They suck
customer_reviews.text: It was used and I excepted that, but it was warped on the inside and my son couldn't play any games on it of course that was after I had to purchase all the cords
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Shipping was quick ps2 is in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.text: Got my playstations 2 within 3 days. Super quick! It came packaged very well, The console was dusty but thats okay!, no scratches were on console. Perfect condition!. Came with controller and all cords. When I started it up it ran smooth and played the disc quickly. It doesn't make noises or anything during start up and play(:! It is the slim so be sure to keep a small fan blowing on it or keep it propped up with books or dvds. Anyway, I got my ps2 from (Planet Lewt) Thanks Guys!
customer_reviews.author: DestinyWolfe

customer_reviews.title: DOA: Screen tearing/rendering Issue
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting a screen tearing/rendering issue. I assume this console was untested. I learned my lesson. I wouldn't recommend buying used consoles if you cant talk to the seller. I tested 2 different video cables (component and composite) with multiple games. So far i'm 2/2 from receiving broken consoles. First the original xbox now a ps2.
customer_reviews.author: 20XMedia

customer_reviews.title: Did not read discs, do not buy from chrisny
customer_reviews.text: The seller (chrisny) that I bought this from insured that this "worked fine". Well, it didn't. The system would power on, but it wouldn't read discs at all! And he sent me a halfway cracked controller! (Which he NEVER mentioned by the way) I tried contacting him, but he never responded. If you want to buy a PS2 especially the slim these days, buy them from reliable sellers and ask them first if its fully functional (asking them if the disc drive works properly is especially important, if the sellers don't reply, don't buy it) Oh and a tip of advice: DO NOT BUY from the seller chrisny, trust me.
customer_reviews.author: CMallows1996

customer_reviews.title: Beyond unsatisfactory!
customer_reviews.text: Console arrived looking as if it was dragged through a sawdust pile. The door to insert game was scotch taped shut, obviously because it would not stay shut. The console never worked and outside was trashed beyond used cosmetic wear. All this for a total of 109.00. I am not happy at having to take time to repack, drive uptown and then wait in line at ups store to ship. I dislike having to return things, twicefold when it's due to a seller knowingly shipping garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Todd S.

customer_reviews.title: Did not read disks at all until....
customer_reviews.text: The ps2 I received did not read discs. I messed around with it for a while realizing it was the lid not clicking shut evenly. I had to open up the console and put tape over the pressure point notch where the lid wasnt fully hitting that triggers the disc reader. That solved the problem. Giving 2 stars because although it was an easy fix, I should not have received a console that didn't work. Shipping was super fast though.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: An old friend returns
customer_reviews.text: An excellent console that serves as a time capsule for me. It was my first real foray into gaming, and I fondly remember all of the great games I played on it. I had to get another, for old times sake. And it arrived on time, just as advertised. Words cannot describe how happy I was to see the "Sony Computer Entertainment" screen after many years! I popped in an old favorite of mine, Sly 2, and got to playing. Now I have it setup to my hdtv via an hdmi adapter that works very well, and the picture looks great. If you are looking for the greatest video game system of all time, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The PlayStation did come scratched as advertised and I checked to make sure that it works which it does turn on and hopefully it will play games. I am disappointed that the controller was broken and taped together. That was not advertised, that I would receive a broken controller.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Art

customer_reviews.title: Some Hiccups, but Easily Fixed | PS2 Works Great
customer_reviews.text: The PS2 got here faster than expected, and the console turned on with no issues. There is some cosmetic issues, and the console was originally in French when I got it (which i understand, given the seller was most likely French Canadian). However, the controller sent was defective, making it impossible to use without having to unplug and plug back in. Thankfully, however, the seller refunded me for controller price, and I've had no further issues. They were quick to fix the mistake, and were very polite as well.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Arnold

customer_reviews.title: love my ps2!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yay!!! I love love love my ps2 I can finally play my kingdom hearts games! I have had it for over a month and my family loves it. Well me and my kiddos. Lol hubby got an xbox one so he has no intrest in it. Everything works great. It came with an sp2 slim, controller and all the cords. It took a bit to get here, but has been totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: dallie

customer_reviews.title: PS2 would not play any disks. Return process is a struggle. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.text: We gave this item as a gift, but when the person we gave it to tried to use it, he spent time setting up all of his info only to find out that the system would not support any game or DVD he put in it. The return process is not straight forward either. It has been 10 days since he returned the PS2 and the refund still does not appear on the card we purchased it with. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M Moore

customer_reviews.title: Arrived working and in good order.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous about buying vintage electronics! But I really wanted this PS2 as I had specific games I really love to play. Took a chance and everything worked out well. Everything was as advertised and it worked out of the box. I have been using it for a month now and have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Rotten

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Playstation 2
customer_reviews.text: Ran guitar hero 3 for a few hours then froze in the loading screen everytime, tried the disc in my buddies and it froze in the same spot, then tried another disc, same thing ran for an hour but then long loading times until it freezes, both discs have circular scratches. I'm assuming this system scratched these discs as they both started fine and deteriorated with use in this system. I've cleaned it with electrical spray and the discs with cleaner nothing helps the freezing or loading times and my discs are now ruined. Disappointed. *Update - return was fast and easy, trying a refurbished this time.
customer_reviews.author: TheReviewer

customer_reviews.title: This is like managing to build an amazing spacefaring vessel
customer_reviews.text: Why would you build a console without a grounding wire? Do you know how many PS2's I've killed with simple basic ambient static? You basically need to touch a grounding base before touching your PS2, which you will eventually forget once to do. This is like managing to build an amazing spacefaring vessel. But forgetting about bathrooms. How did this happen, Sony? Why can something that costs hundreds EACH TIME die to balloons?
customer_reviews.author: Jay Miles

customer_reviews.title: Product worked as soon as I plugged it in. ...
customer_reviews.text: Product worked as soon as I plugged it in. Playing the games I played 10 years ago really brought back memories.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the PS2!
customer_reviews.text: This console has been really fun to play games on. It's sleek and has a great design. You can play PS2 games and PS1 games on it. One thing that bothers me is that in the manual it says that it doesn't play some games right. I tried playing a baseball game for PS2 and it didn't work when up to bat. PS1 baseball games work okay though. I still gave the console 5 stars . Also you need a PS1 memory card to save PS1 games.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: and bought my third to backup my still functioning 2nd unit(I am not buying that stupid ps4 when ps3 is just as good)ps2 rocks w
customer_reviews.text: product arrived new in box this is my third ps2 bought the original many years ago and gave it away as a gift(it still works,by the way)bought a second when sony decided stupidly to stop backwards support on ps3...and bought my third to backup my still functioning 2nd unit(I am not buying that stupid ps4 when ps3 is just as good)ps2 rocks with great retro games like tomb raider legend madden 2002 ncaa football 2002 and literally scores more (resident evil nemesis)this unit like all my ps2 is sturdy and I expect durable based on previous experience...between this and my 160 gig ps3 I am set for many years of fun WITHOUT over hyped ps4
customer_reviews.author: herman keene

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite consoles!
customer_reviews.text: After my PS3 with Ps2 backward compatibility died again I decided to purchase this from amazon warehouse, as I realised that more than half of my gaming on the PS3 was PS2 games. The unit I bought was marked as damaged packaging. The damage? A small ding of the package. This PS2 slim unit was brand new and in brand new shape.. It works great and has provided many, many hours of enjoyment. I recommend getting a wireless controller though. Reverting back to the Dual shock 2 after having a wireless controller definitely left some pains.
customer_reviews.author: N. Barker

customer_reviews.title: great console
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my boyfriend to play his sold game from his childhood and he LOVES it!! I bought it "used" but it was almost mint condition and he has not had a single problem with it for about a year now, and runs games smoothly and perfectly! ghe told me how he literally used to burn out his old PS2s from frequent use, but this one is holding up nicely! the controller it came with was also perfect, and the guy threw in his old games that came with the console that were also in PERFECT condition! I am really glad I bought it used for a good discount rather than bought it new.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased, console came as described, and intact, as well for the cables, controller, ETC, everything came as expected, everything works, I will update this is anything changes, did the same with another PS2 console I got awhile back, it worked for a few hours then it quit, but this one shows a good promise it’ll stay working, now I can play the Old PS2 games from my childhood again.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Smith

customer_reviews.title: Functions as expected, in disgusting condition.
customer_reviews.text: Updating my review to say that after finally taking apart the controller to clean it, it was definitely not cleaned in any sort of way before it got to me. It's disgusting inside there and frankly I'm not sure I can even use it because I have a feeling I know how the last person used it... The only reason I'm leaving 2 stars is because the console works great. Don't buy from Sosa Games.
customer_reviews.author: Whyayala

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Failed to play most games, picture was in black and white when it did work. The return process was fast and easy but only received a partial refund in the form of amazon credit. Bought a working replacement elsewhere for about half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fastercat

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I love the PS2 and its cross compatibility with the PS1. I have many games that I still play for both consoles. If you're a fan of classic games and want a console that is sleek and fairly sturdy, then the PS2 is right for you.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Smith

customer_reviews.title: Classic game system
customer_reviews.text: The Playstation 2 is one of those classic game systems that are great to have around. I usually break it out every once in a while to play my old games. Works really well, plays DVDs and PS1 games. The slim is more compact and easier to store. This set includes one controller, but even now you can find a second if you choose. It was packaged nicely, with no damage to the box or interior. I bought this several years ago from Amazon, and it is still going strong, even after 7 moves.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great system, everything worked but the power cable which only has a shortage.
customer_reviews.text: The game system came fast and there was even a surprise inside of the box. They sent 2 controllers and also the two games like they said and the times that I’ve been able to play the game has worked great. The only problem that I do have is with the cord, I think there’s a shortage on the cord but everything else was great.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Greatness
customer_reviews.text: A great console. I've had several of these machines over the years. I started with the fat version, and moved to the slim. They last a long time, as my last one finally died after 10+ years. I still have a lot of games to beat on this console, so i'm very happy to have another one that works.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas J Klotz

customer_reviews.title: The best machine ever in gaming PS 2
customer_reviews.text: The good ole slim ps2 still the best gaming console in the history of games so many hours at your hands so many classic titles metal gear 3 resident evil 4 wwe smack down games...soo many more games I missed you know the deal the ps2 holds up today I have this sitting right next to my ps4 classic gaming plays ps1.Final Fantasies tekken 5 what!!! Devil may cry, Silent hill 2 and 4 wooowww long live the ps2..
customer_reviews.author: Fjy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.  Not even one star would I give this
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy The system was very dirty. But on top of that. It didn't work. I'm still waiting for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Gary E. Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: Check the wires
customer_reviews.text: the console was fine but the wire's with it were cut and wrapped, the cut was not seen because it was wrapped. I'm not Shure if they looked at the wires. the console was fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Fan

customer_reviews.title: One bad unit, second arrived today....
customer_reviews.text: So I have no ordered a second unit to replace my first one, which I will have no issue returning but the process is a headache. The first ps2 had some disc read error which forced the system to have to reboot to work, and I specifically ordered it from Amazon warehouse deals hoping to stream line any issues I had. Well it's not amazon direct so again although no issues with returning the unit, have about a month, it's just dissapointing an issue like this got through.
customer_reviews.author: justin marquis

customer_reviews.title: Still loving it!
customer_reviews.text: The PS2 is one of the best gaming consoles that have ever been released. The games can even stand their own against some of todays titles. This was a powerful system at the time, and the fact that it can still impress people with it's graphics says a lot about the console. I purchased this in 2011, when my original PS2 finally died on me, and I have played it more than I have played the PS3. A classic game console that's almost as fun as a Super Nintendo!
customer_reviews.author: Shaide

customer_reviews.title: False Reporting of conditions
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the item and it stated that it was in Very good condition. The machine was used and didn't fit the picture on the advertisement when I received it. I opened it a day later and discovered that the machine would not allow the memory card to save the game. I had ordered an additional card and that one had the same problem. I returned the machine and still waiting on my money back. Please don't sale defective equipment. I spent $169.00 for something that should have been $30
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't read discs
customer_reviews.text: I got this after my first PlayStation broke. It was region-locked to Mexico, and wouldn't read any discs I put in it. I decided to bite the bullet and buy it despite all the bad reviews, and that was a big mistake. The included controller was also dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Console works fine, I got the "little brother" madcatz controller
customer_reviews.text: Console works fine, I got the "little brother" madcatz controller. Not upset about that but it had to go. No one should ever use a madcatz controller. Overall, this is the best retro system ever!
customer_reviews.author: König

customer_reviews.title: Only complaint is that it doesn't turn off like I wish it did
customer_reviews.text: Solid PS2; Only complaint is that it doesn't turn off like I wish it did..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get Them While They're Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is a Playstation 2, arguably the greatest console built so far. With the removal of backwards compatibility from Playstation 3, those who want to experience the diverse catalog of PS2 games will need to buy this system. Best to buy it soon as they're no longer being manufactured and prices will sky rocket. Addendum Feb 23, 2013: With the official announcement of the Playstation 4, reliable backwards compatibility may be a thing of the past. While Sony promises PS2 games via a streaming service for the PS4, those who want to play it safe have even more reason to get a classic PS2.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rioseco

customer_reviews.title: happy I found it for a good cost for his ...
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loves the older model,,, So, happy I found it for a good cost for his last minute Bday gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work when I tried to use it. ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work when I tried to use it. Could have been cause from sitting too long with out been plug into a power source, buy the seller. I have written it off as a lose.
customer_reviews.author: joel williams

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy PS2 cheap, because I know I learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.text: Will never buy a PS2 or any console after this. The cord to connect for the picture was taped up because it was damaged along with the controller that came with it. You could literally see the inside of the controller a little bit and plus the console, connect wires and controller was dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: SEND THE CORRECT AV ADAPTER
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that was a problem was that it did not come with the correct AV adapter cord. But luckily I had an extra one that was correct to fit it. Other than that the system performs great and really brings back a lot of good memories from my childhood. But please you guys, start sending the correct cord because somebody else could write a really bad review ab this
customer_reviews.author: joshua adams

customer_reviews.title: PS2 switch?
customer_reviews.text: I am glad the old PS2 console sent to me works. I did not get the slim console for some reason, but it's ok. Now let me get back to playing Tekken Tag Tournament.
customer_reviews.author: sean campbell

customer_reviews.title: It's brand new & factory sealed
customer_reviews.text: The seller sold me a brand new & factory sealed ps2 slim console that works & was in good condition. & I recommend others to purchase from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: floodingorangerooster

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive as advertised. No power cord. No controller.
customer_reviews.text: did not get what was advertised. Advertised, a ps2 slim console, appropriate cords, and a controller. Neither power cord nor controller received.
customer_reviews.author: bzzi

customer_reviews.title: "LIKE NEW" 'NOT'____!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Console would not power up from the get go, when it finally did' it did not read any of the games that I tried. "LIKE NEW' I DON'T THINK SO" I'll be returning this back to seller and will not buy from them again"EVER"
customer_reviews.author: Jack Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Troublesome Reading Disc
customer_reviews.text: Honest Review. PS2 has a problem when reading the disc. Multiple times of opening, removing the disc, reinserting and hoping this time it reads. Other than that the cords and controller works well.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart King

customer_reviews.title: Lies and moneygrabs
customer_reviews.text: First of all I got the silver model which wasn't what was advertised and to top it all off the lid for the disc compartment doesn't close easily anymore and the disc reader doesn't work, tried it out on like 8 other ps2 games and none of them ran, thanks for stealing my money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia that was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two PS2 Slims from Amazon. The first had a broken disk drive that wouldn't spin or read disks. The second one was missing the aux cable. Once that was replaced, it proceeded to scratch not one, but two disks that previously had no scratches on them.
customer_reviews.author: Think Outside the Books

customer_reviews.title: Used - Works
customer_reviews.text: My PS2 came relatively quickly, and in decent condition. My only gripe was that it was FILTHY and I spent about an hour cleaning it with rubbing alcohol and water. My other problem was the video cord was cracked and only sort of worked with some issues in sound. I replaced it with a cord off amazon that cost me a dollar and I'm all set. Guess this is what happens when you receive a used item, but it works, and you can't beat $50. Just know that your rolling the dice with used products, so far I have been lucky with only a few speed bumps.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.

customer_reviews.title: Bummed Story
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace my Ps2 because it sadly died after survived middle school and high school. I was so bummed but I had to replace it given my growing collection of PS2 games.
customer_reviews.author: Squirtle11287

customer_reviews.title: This is our second one.  We finally wore the first one out.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best kids games came out for the playstation 2, and since the playstation 3 is not backwards compatible, we had to try to get another one of these when ours finally started acting up (after an obscene amount of use over the years). I was so thrilled to find a brand new one of these on Amazon. It came in 2 days brand new in the box and I got a warranty. So cool.
customer_reviews.author: Spicy Mamma

customer_reviews.title: my video-game lovin' husband is now a happy happy man
customer_reviews.text: Husband purchased this as a Christmas gift for himself...After another PS2 system that he had broke. I thought the purchase price was a little too much...considering the "rest of the world" has now moved on to PS4. However, my video-game lovin' husband is now a happy happy man... So I can't really complain.
customer_reviews.author: TheOtherMrsM

customer_reviews.title: Expect it not to work properly.
customer_reviews.text: Will play most games however the player had a disc read error on certain games from day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M couture II

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Console
customer_reviews.text: Its the same as the thicker PS2 consoles, and at such a cheap price I think people should get them before they are no longer available. This is an amazing system with so many amazing games. I am biased towards first generation systems because most of them were my childhood. I can easily see why this console was so successful and will go down in history as being one of the longest running consoles ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Very Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: The Ps2 is in great condition, packed nicely, and everything was clean... however it continues to freeze up and go to black screen and won't play some of my favorite games (which my old Ps2 did just fine until it eventually broke down) this PS2 is clean in perfect condition but is having major issues can't play my favorite Rpgs which are very long games and this freezes up on multiple games during the intro. I chose a "good condition" one and paid higher price than a lower price poor condition one from Amazon but yet I can't use it.. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A hint to the clueless
customer_reviews.text: For all of you clueless adults out there: you must purchase a memory card or the kids can't save their games and have to start over from the very beginning, which can be tedious. My daughter played continuously for hours on end, sleepy-eyed even in the day or so following Christmas (before we purchased a memory card), simply because when she turned the game off, it would be lost forever. Save your children. Buy a memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Very clean system. Works great. Shipped and recieved fast. I love it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Resudek

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Everything was great. Plays nice. And all stuff was there to start playing. So it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: I opened it up, and the console had solid dirt stains all over it. Then it failed to read any of the discs I put inside of it. At first I thought it was the disc, but I put 6 different games in there. I highly recommend buying from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Faridy Hammond

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.text: This product did not arrive on time and when it finally arrived (like 1 month later), it didn't work. The discs don't play in the console. I have to say that this experience was extremely disappointing! I am going to try to return it for a replacement console. If this experience is better, I will let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald

customer_reviews.title: Works! & good for 45$
customer_reviews.text: I was super sketched waiting for this package because I didn’t read the reviews until after I ordered the PS2 Slim. & saw a lot of sketchy bad reviews, & had me worried. But once I received my ps2 (pretty fast too) & plugged it in. It worked great! Played it for hours in a row & worked perfectly. The remote worked great too!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roa

customer_reviews.title: Good to go.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality of all parts. Shipped on time. Still playing games on it today.
customer_reviews.author: Inq

customer_reviews.title: Didnt even work
customer_reviews.text: The ps2 did not work and the controller was not even play station brand. Very unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jothan&Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but feels delicate for loading discs
customer_reviews.text: The system itself is good times...lots of fun and it is what it is, a PS2. This new slimmer design is almost too small if you can imagine that. Very thin and light. Would buy again regardless and very good deal for the price. Sometimes it feels like I need to insert the discs very carefully out of fear of breaking the disc mechanism. Overall A on the fun, A- on the slimmer design.
customer_reviews.author: jhesse23

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: My old console (the original ps2) finally crapped out and I was very upset as I had so many games. I decided to purchase this console mainly for the price, which was very reasonable. When it arrived I was surprised at how light and small it was. I was scared that I got ripped off as it felt like a toy and not a console. I had never seen a slim ps2 so to put in perspective the size it fits on top of my Verizon box and there is still plenty of room left to fit my wii next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Messier

customer_reviews.title: ITS OKAY ( I guess)
customer_reviews.text: Had it for three days now it's okay doesn't play all games has trouble here and there but it's okay it came with a game and the cords but no controller which is alright 4 stars because some games don't work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 days ago and I already received it! The packaging was wrapped so nicely and with such care. I've been using the ps2 for about an hour now and have not had any issues or complaints yet. The controller was a little dinged up, but it works just fine. I only wished that the ps2 came with a memory card. Other than that, thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Destinie Buell

customer_reviews.title: The lens seems to be damaged. I thought it ...
customer_reviews.text: The lens seems to be damaged. I thought it might be dust at first, but I cleaned my entire desk and room and the ps2 slim is still having disc reading issues. This is also not a brand new item. The seller is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Its very slim....
customer_reviews.text: I had an original PS2, back in the early 2000's, and sold it. I recently bought this for nostalgic reasons, and I found the slim console to be super small! Its about the size of four DVDs stacked two high, side by side. The only drawback is that it is so light, that even a slight tug on the controller wire will pull the consle accross a flat surface. Everything else is pretty much the same as I remember the old console being. Just much smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Bjorn Olafsson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Fast delievery with protective packaging. However, the PlayStation 2 slim system I received does not work. Power button is broken so it will not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: michael eastburn

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st PS2 and so I got it used..The delivery was prompt,For just 55 USD,CG Enterprise provided excellent service,I am very happy abt my purchase.. If U are a newb like me in PS1/PS2,I would advise you guys/gals 2 go 4 the PS@ s U can play almost ll PS/PS1 games on PS2 but not vice verse.. No need to hesitate in buying used item either,Amazon provides a superb service,I am very happy!! 5 Stars!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Natasha Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old had dropped his old PS2 trying to move it from one room to another. Even though he has every console out, he was very upset bc he has so many PS2 games and he always seem to go back to this console. I refused to buy him a brand new one out of fear that the same thing may happen again. I ordered this one, it arrived quickly, well packaged, and it great condition! Most importantly my son couldn't thank me enough, I earned a lot of points that day.
customer_reviews.author: A Nu Redd

customer_reviews.title: Act weird. Put in a game, its in ...
customer_reviews.text: Act weird. Put in a game, its in spanish until you reset a few times to get it in english.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: System works fine. Cords were crusted with paint
customer_reviews.text: System works fine. Cords were crusted with paint, system covered in scratchs, was poorly packaged that I could not tell if the system came damaged or was damaged in the process of being recieved. The damage was the lid that opens and closes to start the game doesn’t lock in place. So unless something is placed on the lid to keep it down, it does not read the discs.
customer_reviews.author: mike mendonca

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: Worked for two weeks but at least it did work when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Systems Around.
customer_reviews.text: The PlayStation 2 deserves its reputation as the best selling game system of all time. It gave us great games such as Final Fantasy X and Fatal Frame 3 and even gave the start to some great new franchises at the time such as God of War and Jak and Daxter. There are over 3000 games for the system which should make any game collector drool with delight.
customer_reviews.author: Grust

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a pice of junk I try cut it on but it go to green for a sec then back red I probably have to take it apart and fix the thing I wouldn’t give it 1 star
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lawson

customer_reviews.title: I tried the PS 3 and did not like the same racing games on it as the didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: looks new I just bought it to hold onto so when 1 of my other ones stop working I have a replacement. I tried the PS 3 and did not like the same racing games on it as the didn't act like a real car does ( I'm 54 and I have done more then my share of racing ) on and off road, drag strip too.
customer_reviews.author: Rev.Howard

customer_reviews.title: Works great, just get the fat version if you don't have blue discs.
customer_reviews.text: if your looking for a PS2, get this version, no matter what. even if it doesent come with all the cords. why? because this is the better version. older ("FAT") versions of ps2 wear down over time, and in my experience (trying all the tricks in the book that let you "read them on the system") don't read blue discs after a long time. if you don't have any old games for the system with blue sides, or cheating devices like game shark or action replay, then i recommend getting a fat. but honestly the slim is more compatible. the only gripe i have is the controller and memory card ports being close to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Beers

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: The item shipped quickly and arrived on time. It seemded to be in good condition when I took it out of the box. It turned on and would go to the default browser/start up screen, but when I placed a disc inside to play a game it would not read it. It also left a ring around the disc which ultimately turned out to be cosmetic only, the game plays fine in other PS2 consoles.
customer_reviews.author: DeadlyKitten

customer_reviews.title: Great product for its age.
customer_reviews.text: It works, plays the ntsc games I imported, the power bank can be used on or 220v power supply (had to change the supply cable). It is pure used so it has minor scratches on the body.
customer_reviews.author: Rzarecters cc

customer_reviews.title: Received defective console
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a review of the product, it's a review of the seller. I received mine and tried to use it but the console quickly started overheating and giving disc read errors. There has to be ways to put in more quality controls, especially when third party sellers are involved as there is a greater risk of getting a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: stefano

customer_reviews.title: ... this so that i can play some of my favorite games and this did not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this so that i can play some of my favorite games and this did not disappoint. Received the product in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: terrance abid

customer_reviews.title: "JUST" the consle
customer_reviews.text: So i got this pretty quick in 2 days after my last purchase canceled it look fine and I'm sure it works because it said 94-97% guaranteed i just wish i would've known its just the console and didn't include a power cord so now I'm waiting for that to come befor i even get to try it out so reason this got a 2
customer_reviews.author: AJ Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Playstation 2 Console Slim
customer_reviews.text: I have several PS2 games that I have not played in years, due to my old console going out. I finally decided to see if I could locate another new console for my games. I was super surprised when I found such item on Amazon. WorldWide Distributors had the new consoles in stock, ready to ship, at a great price. I feel like a kid again....I have played the console for a little over a week now, with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: L "Patrick"

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought It'd be
customer_reviews.text: Although the size is a little off-putting, after playing with some games, my opinion of it improved considerably. I played god of war and my conclusion is the slim is just as powerful as it's much larger cousins. The size actually works to you're advantage if you aren't exceptionally clean when it comes to tv's and their connections because it cleans easy.The slim I received was the 77XXXXXXX series in case you're wondering.
customer_reviews.author: Dojo Master

customer_reviews.title: the PS2 console was good, I haven't tested the memory card
customer_reviews.text: The item was almost OK., the PS2 console was good, I haven't tested the memory card, the AV cable is good, but the controller does not work with the only game I have and the only I like to play (MLB10 the show). I contacted the rep and they issued me a partial refund of US$ 8.00.
customer_reviews.author: victor

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: ordered this used in good condition. when it got here it was in the box just like it would be if purchased from a store. very pleased with that. the box was in good condition but you could tell that it had been opened a few times. not a big deal. the ps2 works very well with no trouble. it also came with a controller and the cords needed for it. i would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: crazymomma

customer_reviews.title: PS2
customer_reviews.text: The seller was great and the PS2 I got worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: jacob gehring

customer_reviews.title: Great new Ps2 console, but had a faulty controller.
customer_reviews.text: I was told that I was buying a brand new ps2 console everything looks great and works fine but I would of given this ps2 5 stars but the controller I was sent had button problems and did not work properly. Hey guys please send products that are tested before they are sent out.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: love this system
customer_reviews.text: love this system. They should have never gotten rid of backward compatability with the ps1 and 2 for the later consolse
customer_reviews.author: togegawa

customer_reviews.title: Solid purchase
customer_reviews.text: Came in the condition I payed for (very good). Well cleaned and no issues except for 2 minor dents on the corners. Recommended to not purchase a PS2 if it is over $90 dollars because of the weak strength in the disk tray/lens-reading system, so inevitably being an older console it can be fickle.
customer_reviews.author: C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Get it while you can!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and works well. The one I had before always turned off at random because the external power supply was bad and I always had to mess around with it to turn on. This console has the power supply inside it which I have no worries when I turn it on. Great and would recommend this to a lover of the classic PS1 and PS2 games.
customer_reviews.author: PooPanda

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my fat old PS2.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 15 months ago. Still works. Functions the same. Backwards compatible with PS1 games. Plays DVDs. I don't game with consoles online, but the connection is there, so I don't see why it wouldn't. Cons? Doesn't have a hard drive. Buy a memory card. I have a PS2 memory card in the first slot, and a PS1 memory card in the second slot. Works out nicely. PS1 games won't save to a PS2 memory card. Sony brand PS1 memory cards have to be bought secondhand nowadays, or you'll have to mess with off-brand versions, if you want to be able to save your PS1 games. Good luck. Have fun.
customer_reviews.author: subMJM

customer_reviews.title: One very nice feature it will play my PS 1 Game Collection ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the PS 2 on Time... One very nice feature it will play my PS 1 Game Collection as well... Plus I can use my Old PS 2 and PS 1 Memory Cards and other accessories in this unit as well... Recommend this too everyone... You Won't Believe The Size... Extremely Small !!! Note that it is a Top Loader,so the Lid will Pop Up, and you need to leave enough room where you place it to allow the height.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ryok

customer_reviews.title: love it, but I have one problem.
customer_reviews.text: this 9000 series is really very good. I do have one pet peave; it makes me define a parental password each and every time I put in a disk with parental settings. I would rather simply turn parental guidance off completely like I could with the 7000 series ps2; but it is solid and it is a ps2 so -- thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Eulene Randall

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly packaged and works great
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing! Quiet and slim, it came as promised! The remote was a bit stiff, possibly from lack of use, but everything works perfectly well. Have not had issues thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Safar

customer_reviews.title: Bought the PS2 slim black console in June. It ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the PS2 slim black console in June. It worked for about a month before it went kaput on me but I got my moneys worth for the while that it did work. I'm giving it a three because of this, last time I bought a PS2 that was used, it lasted me two years, not thirty days. Hope the seller doesn't take it personally.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bell

product_meta.title: PlayStation 2 Console Slim PS2
product_meta.description: Whether you're a die-hard PlayStation 2 fan or a new player, this totally redesigned PlayStation 2 console will meet the demands of your game playing. The internal design architecture has been completely overhauled. Internal volume has been reduced by 75 percent, the system's overall weight & thickness has been reduced incredibly. The smaller, sleeker design makes it easy to carry around and enjoy games any time, anywhere. It keeps the PS2's powerful 300MHz processor, for enhanced clarity and mesmerizing graphics. Also comes with one standard PS2 controller.
